data.actual_result: The right side of the progress bar goes to the edge of the window
data.expected_result: The right side of the update progress bar would cap off
data.short_description: Progress bar for update does not cap after update failure
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on or run an outdated client - While it attempts an update, trigger a connection error (unplug ethernet) - Re-allow connection - Watch the progress bar
